channel.title: Dice bag freeze
channel.description:
I have added a dice bag client sided so the server could have dicing on a 317... but when i join a clan and actually roll the dice my client freeze and give me this error
[CODE] java.lang.NullPointerException
4 2 3 4 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2075 at client.method101(client.java:8195) at client.method96(client.java:7947) at client.method114(client.java:9238) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3173) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2326) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101) at client.run(client.java:4751) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662) [/CODE]
any help?

item.title: Dice bag freeze
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

What did u added client sided? Since you only meed the itemdef ints and models?

Read full topic
